items.name: Brick Builders' Oasis
items.short_description: A vibrant indoor park where kids can build towering structures, design vehicles, and create their own Lego cities. Features themed building zones and a large free-play area.
items.address: 12 Rue des Dattes, Quartier Industriel, Nouadhibou

items.name: Nouadhibou Construct-o-Rama
items.short_description: An interactive construction site for kids, using large soft blocks and Lego Duplo bricks. Children can operate mini diggers and cranes in a safe, imaginative environment.
items.address: 5 Avenue du Commerce, Centre Ville, Nouadhibou

items.name: Desert Brick Safari
items.short_description: Explore a unique Lego landscape inspired by the Mauritanian desert and its wildlife. Build your own desert creatures and vehicles to navigate through sandy dunes made of bricks.
items.address: Route de Cansado, Zone Touristique, Nouadhibou

items.name: Ocean Brick Bay
items.short_description: A LEGO theme park section focusing on marine life and port activities. Kids can build ships, underwater cities, and sea creatures, with interactive water-play elements.
items.address: Boulevard Maritime, près du Port, Nouadhibou

items.name: Nouadhibou Mini-Zoo & Aviary
items.short_description: A small, well-maintained zoo featuring a selection of local and exotic birds, small mammals, and reptiles. Focuses on conservation education and animal welfare.
items.address: Parc National du Banc d'Arguin, Route N2, Nouadhibou

items.name: Desert Critters Petting Farm
items.short_description: An interactive petting zoo where children can safely interact with friendly farm animals like goats, sheep, and donkeys, as well as learn about desert-adapted creatures.
items.address: Ferme Pédagogique, Route de l'Aéroport, Nouadhibou

items.name: Marine Life Discovery Aquarium (Mini-Zoo Section)
items.short_description: While primarily an aquarium, it includes a 'mini-zoo' section showcasing marine mammals and coastal birds rescued from the local waters, offering educational talks.
items.address: Quai des Pêcheurs, près du Port, Nouadhibou

items.name: Ostrich & Gazelle Enclosure
items.short_description: A specialized, spacious enclosure dedicated to indigenous desert animals such as ostriches and various gazelle species, allowing visitors to observe them in a near-natural habitat.
items.address: Zone de Cansado, Route N2, Nouadhibou

items.name: Desert Soccer Kids League
items.short_description: A mini-soccer arena specifically designed for children aged 5-12, offering small-sided games, coaching sessions, and mini-tournaments on artificial turf.
items.address: Terrain de Sport N°3, Avenue de la République, Nouadhibou

items.name: Coastal Court Hoops
items.short_description: An outdoor mini-basketball court complex with adjustable hoops and soft ground, perfect for kids to practice shooting, dribbling, and friendly pickup games by the sea breeze.
items.address: Boulevard du Port, près du Phare, Nouadhibou

items.name: Mini-Golf Oasis
items.short_description: A creatively designed 18-hole mini-golf course with a desert oasis theme, featuring fun obstacles and challenges suitable for all ages, but particularly engaging for children.
items.address: 7 Rue des Palmiers, Zone Loisirs, Nouadhibou

items.name: Adventure Skate Park (Kids Zone)
items.short_description: A dedicated and supervised section within a larger skate park, offering smaller ramps, low rails, and flat areas for children to learn skateboarding, rollerblading, and scootering safely.
items.address: Parc des Jeunes, Rue des Sports, Nouadhibou

items.name: Sahara Sands Adventure Park
items.short_description: An expansive adventure park featuring elaborate climbing structures, zip lines, obstacle courses, and a giant sandpit. Designed to challenge and excite children with a desert theme.
items.address: Parc Public des Dunes, Route N2, Nouadhibou

items.name: Portside Play Haven
items.short_description: A nautical-themed playground located near the port, with structures resembling ships, lighthouses, and marine creatures. Includes swings, slides, and water play features.
items.address: Esplanade du Port, Boulevard Maritime, Nouadhibou

items.name: Oasis Springs Playground
items.short_description: A lush, shaded playground offering a respite from the sun. Features traditional swings, slides, merry-go-rounds, and a small splash pad for cooling off in the warmer months.
items.address: Jardin Public, Avenue de l'Indépendance, Nouadhibou

items.name: Dino Dig Discovery Park
items.short_description: An archaeological-themed adventure park where kids can dig for 'dinosaur bones' in a large sandpit, climb on prehistoric-themed structures, and explore a fossil maze.
items.address: Site Archéologique des Jeunes, Quartier du Nord, Nouadhibou

items.name: Nouadhibou Little Explorers Museum
items.short_description: An interactive museum designed for young children, featuring hands-on exhibits that encourage imaginative play, sensory exploration, and early learning across various themes.
items.address: Centre Culturel, Rue de la Paix, Nouadhibou

items.name: Coastal Culture Kids Gallery
items.short_description: This museum introduces children to the rich maritime history and culture of Nouadhibou and Mauritania through engaging exhibits, traditional craft workshops, and storytelling sessions.
items.address: Ancien Port, Boulevard Maritime, Nouadhibou

items.name: My City, My Home Museum
items.short_description: A miniature city where kids can role-play various community roles like firefighters, doctors, shopkeepers, and construction workers, fostering social skills and civic awareness.
items.address: 15 Avenue Principale, Quartier Résidentiel, Nouadhibou

items.name: Desert Discovery Children's Museum
items.short_description: Focuses on the unique ecosystem, geology, and nomadic cultures of the Sahara. Exhibits include sand exploration, desert animal models, and traditional tent building.
items.address: Route de Cansado, Centre d'Études Désertiques, Nouadhibou

items.name: Nouadhibou Young Scientists Lab
items.short_description: A hands-on science center for kids, featuring interactive experiments in physics, chemistry, and biology. Encourages inquiry and discovery through engaging activities.
items.address: Centre de Recherche Scientifique, Quartier Universitaire, Nouadhibou

items.name: Marine Science Exploratorium
items.short_description: Dedicated to marine biology and oceanography, this center allows children to explore the underwater world through interactive displays, touch tanks, and simulations of ocean currents.
items.address: Pôle Scientifique Maritime, près de l'IMROP, Nouadhibou

items.name: Energy Explorers Center
items.short_description: An interactive center teaching children about different forms of energy – solar, wind, and kinetic – through fun, hands-on exhibits like building mini wind turbines and solar cars.
items.address: 20 Rue des Énergies, Zone Technologique, Nouadhibou

items.name: Desert Skies & Earth Science Hub
items.short_description: This center focuses on geology, meteorology, and astronomy of the desert region. Kids can learn about rock formations, weather patterns, and celestial bodies visible from Nouadhibou.
items.address: Observatoire Junior, Route de l'Est, Nouadhibou

items.name: Portside Pirate Ship Carousel
items.short_description: A classic carousel with a pirate ship theme, featuring various sea creatures and swashbuckling characters instead of horses. Located with views of the actual port.
items.address: Place du Souvenir, Boulevard Maritime, Nouadhibou

items.name: Mini-Ferris Wheel of Nouadhibou
items.short_description: A colorful, kid-friendly Ferris wheel offering gentle rides and panoramic views of the city and its coastline from a modest height, perfect for younger children.
items.address: Parc d'Attractions Municipal, Avenue du Parc, Nouadhibou

items.name: Desert Dunes Bumper Cars
items.short_description: A themed bumper car arena where children can drive brightly colored cars designed to look like desert buggies, bumping into each other in a safe, enclosed space.
items.address: Centre de Loisirs Oasis, Route de Cansado, Nouadhibou

items.name: The Speedy Seahorse Roller Coaster (Mini)
items.short_description: A gentle, small-scale roller coaster designed for junior thrill-seekers. It features a marine life theme with a friendly seahorse as its mascot, offering mild drops and turns.
items.address: Parc d'Aventures Aquatiques, Quartier de la Plage, Nouadhibou

items.name: Arabian Nights Storyland
items.short_description: A magical park bringing to life classic tales from 'One Thousand and One Nights,' with themed areas, character meet-and-greets, and enchanting attractions.
items.address: Jardin des Contes, Route Touristique, Nouadhibou

items.name: Desert Princess Castle Park
items.short_description: Explore a beautiful castle-themed park where children can meet desert princesses, attend royal feasts, and participate in magical quests, all set against a Mauritanian backdrop.
items.address: Domaine des Rêves, Avenue du Palais, Nouadhibou

items.name: The Enchanted Oasis Trail
items.short_description: A whimsical walking trail through a landscaped park, adorned with sculptures and interactive scenes depicting local folk tales and mythical desert creatures.
items.address: Parc Naturel des Fables, Quartier Sud, Nouadhibou

items.name: Fishermen's Tales Cove
items.short_description: This park is inspired by local fishermen's legends and sea myths. Children can discover giant fish sculptures, mythical sea creatures, and listen to captivating stories by the water.
items.address: Plage des Histoires, Boulevard Maritime, Nouadhibou

items.name: Starlight Dome Junior Planetarium
items.short_description: A small, kid-friendly planetarium offering immersive shows about stars, planets, and constellations, tailored for young audiences with engaging visuals and simple explanations.
items.address: Centre Astronomique, Route de l'Est, Nouadhibou

items.name: Cosmic Kids Voyage Dome
items.short_description: An interactive planetarium where children embark on a virtual journey through the solar system, learning about each planet through games and animated presentations.
items.address: École Primaire des Étoiles, Avenue Céleste, Nouadhibou

items.name: Desert Night Sky Observatory (Kids Section)
items.short_description: A dedicated area within a larger observatory, featuring child-sized telescopes and guides who help kids identify visible constellations and explain basic celestial phenomena.
items.address: Observatoire du Désert, Zone Éloignée, Nouadhibou

items.name: Galaxy Explorers Play-Lab (Planetarium Annex)
items.short_description: An annex to a planetarium, offering hands-on activities like building rocket models, designing alien creatures, and a mini-simulator for 'flying' through space.
items.address: Complexe Spatial Junior, Rue Galactique, Nouadhibou

items.name: Whispering Sands Story Park
items.short_description: A tranquil park designed for storytelling, with shaded seating areas, a central stage, and sculptures depicting characters from Mauritanian folk tales and desert legends.
items.address: Jardin des Histoires, Quartier des Poètes, Nouadhibou

items.name: The Mariners' Myth Circle
items.short_description: Located by the sea, this park features interactive installations and comfortable nooks where professional storytellers share tales of the ocean, brave sailors, and mythical sea creatures.
items.address: Port des Récits, Boulevard Maritime, Nouadhibou

items.name: Animal Fables Forest
items.short_description: A small, shaded area with carved animal figures and interactive sound stations that play classic fables and stories about desert animals, encouraging imaginative play.
items.address: Parc de la Faune, Route du Parc National, Nouadhibou

items.name: Journey of the Nomads Story Path
items.short_description: An educational storytelling path that narrates the history and traditions of Mauritanian nomadic tribes through interactive exhibits, audio guides, and re-created scenes.
items.address: Musée Vivant des Nomades, Route de l'Ancien Ksar, Nouadhibou
